an10.131:1.1: “Dasayime, bhikkhave, dhamma bhavita bahulikata ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattanti, nannatra sugatavinaya.
an10.131:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhamma bhavita bahulikata ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattanti, nannatra sugatavinaya”ti.
